definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

pinyin: Fei1 zhou1 Kai1 fa1 Yin2 hang2
Fei1 zhou1 Tong3 yi1 Zu3 zhi1
Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1
Fei1 zhou1 ren2 guo2 min2 da4 hui4

definition: single origin out of Africa (current mainstream theory of human evolution)

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛開始贊助的非洲足球聯合會非洲年度最佳球員。

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛開始贊助的非洲足球聯合會非洲年度最佳球員。

sentences.english: For example, we have built a dental clinic in Swaziland, Africa.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我們已經在非洲斯威士蘭建立了一家牙科診所。

sentences.english: We'd like to have them from Africa and Asia as well.
sentences.chinese: “我們也希望有來自非洲和亞洲的小孩”。

sentences.english: Yangyang arrived in Hefei from Guinea, Africa in 2009.
sentences.chinese: “陽陽”來自非洲幾內亞，是2009年來到合肥的。

sentences.english: The company has agencies in all parts of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 該公司在非洲各地設有派出機構。

sentences.english: and you have a lot of Africans in London.
sentences.chinese: 在倫敦，你能見到很多非洲人。

sentences.english: Sometimes, there are over 1000 Africans attending mass.
sentences.chinese: 有時侯，會有超過1000名非洲人蔘加彌撒。

sentences.english: She has journeyed on horseback through Africa and Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 她騎馬旅行，穿過了非洲和土耳其。

sentences.english: Africa is maybe the most beautiful continent in the world.
sentences.chinese: 非洲可能是這個世界上最美麗的大陸了。

sentences.english: Increasingly, however, it is the Chinese who play Africans off against each other.
sentences.chinese: 然而，是中國人越來越多地操縱非洲人之間相互作對。

sentences.english: "Ubuntu" is an ancient African word that means "humanity to others".
sentences.chinese: “烏班圖”是古非洲詞語，意思是“與人分享”。

sentences.english: There was pressure on the university to disinvest in south africa.
sentences.chinese: 這所大學面臨在南部非洲縮減投資的壓力。

sentences.english: China is not the only emerging financier playing a major role in Africa.?
sentences.chinese: 中國不僅是在非洲發揮重要作用的惟一的新興融資方。

sentences.english: Many scientists think, the virus which causes AIDS did jump from the African Green Monkey.
sentences.chinese: 許多科學家認爲，導致艾滋病的病毒來自非洲的青猴。

sentences.english: Its impact has been felt even in small villages in India and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 它的影響甚至連印度和非洲的小村莊裏都已經感受到。

definition: Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
